sentences.en: “While that percentage has increased from 9.5 percent in 1986, it is clear that women are still underrepresented in this realm of academia,” AAUW said in a press release.
sentences.cn: 美国高校妇女联合会在一份新闻简报中表示："尽管这一比例高于1986年时的9.5%，但女性在学术界的这一领域显然没有得到充分的代表。

sentences.en: Motorcycle riders with dirt bike experience are significantly underrepresented in the accident data.
sentences.cn: 有山地车经验的摩托车驾驶员所占比例非常小.

trans.tran_cn: 未被充分代表的，代表名额不足的
trans.tran_en: insufficiently represented or spoken on behalf of
